events.title: Spring Basketball Championship
events.description: Watch varsity teams in the final tournament of the season. Experience the top teams compete for the championship title.
events.imageSource: Tran, David. “Basketball Team Gathering.” Unsplash, 18 Dec. 2017, unsplash.com/photos/basketball-team-gathering-g-dZ1h7nQ0E.
events.fullDescription: Join us for an evening as the top varsity teams compete for the championship title. Features live commentary, halftime shows, and an award ceremony.
events.foodAndBeverage: Concession stand available with snacks, drinks, and light meals

events.title: Spring College Fair
events.description: Connect with representatives from over 50 colleges and universities. Recommended for juniors and seniors to explore higher education options.
events.imageSource: Koloda, Vasily. “group of fresh graduates students throwing their academic hat in the air.” Unsplash, 6 Apr. 2018, unsplash.com/photos/group-of-fresh-graduates-students-throwing-their-academic-hat-in-the-air-8CqDvPuo_kI.
events.fullDescription: Annual college fair featuring representatives from state, private, and community colleges. Information sessions on financial aid, scholarships, and admission processes will be available.
events.foodAndBeverage: Water fountains available, no food service

events.title: Senior Prom: Starry Night
events.description: Senior prom featuring live music, professional photography, and beautiful decorations transforming our gymnasium into an evening under the stars.
events.imageSource: Salazar, Aedrian. “a long table with a vase of flowers on top of it.” Unsplash, 6 June 2022, unsplash.com/photos/a-long-table-with-a-vase-of-flowers-on-top-of-it-FNKcrSMKDYk.
events.fullDescription: Join us for an evening of dancing, music, and memories. Professional DJ and photo booth included.

events.title: Science Fair
events.description: Annual district wide science fair showcasing student projects from elementary through high school levels.
events.imageSource: Orrico, Jesse. “selective focus phot of artificial human skull.” Unsplash, 26 Jan. 2016, unsplash.com/photos/selective-focus-phot-of-artificial-human-skull-rmWtVQN5RzU.
events.fullDescription: Explore creative student projects, watch live demonstrations, and participate in science activities. Special guest speakers from local research institutions.

events.title: Graduation Ceremony
events.description: Class of 2024 Commencement Ceremony celebrating our graduating seniors with guest speakers and award presentations.
events.imageSource: ManuelTheLensman. “person in blue denim jeans holding black paper bag.” Unsplash, 27 May 2021, unsplash.com/photos/person-in-blue-denim-jeans-holding-black-paper-bag-gwpElDVmBvQ.
events.fullDescription: Join us in celebrating our graduating class of 2024. Featuring speakers, musical performances, and giving out diplomas.

events.title: Summer Sports Camp Kickoff
events.description: Opening day of our summer sports program featuring basketball, volleyball, and indoor soccer for youth athletes.
events.imageSource: Cano, Adrià Crehuet. “children playing soccer.” Unsplash, 13 May 2018, unsplash.com/photos/children-playing-soccer-LIhB1_mAGhY.
events.fullDescription: Week long sports camps led by varsity coaches and athletes. Learn fundamental skills, strategy, and sportsmanship in a fun environment.
events.ticketPrice: $200 per week, early bird discount available
events.dressCode: Athletic wear and appropriate shoes required

events.title: Community Health Fair
events.description: Annual health and wellness fair featuring health screenings, fitness demos, and health workshops.
events.imageSource: Unsplash. “doctor holding red stethoscope.” Unsplash, 30 July 2018, unsplash.com/photos/doctor-holding-red-stethoscope-hIgeoQjS_iE.
events.fullDescription: Partner with local healthcare providers for health screenings, and wellness information. Featuring fitness classes and nutrition workshops.
events.foodAndBeverage: Healthy snacks and smoothie bar available

events.title: Fall Talent Show
events.description: Showcase of student talents including musical performances, dances, comedy acts, and more.
events.imageSource: Catalisano, Michel. “woman playing violin beside grand piano.” Unsplash, 7 July 2017, unsplash.com/photos/woman-playing-violin-beside-grand-piano-OZDmI-vO7Io.
events.fullDescription: Annual talent show featuring our talented students. Proceeds benefit the theater department.

events.title: Holiday Craft Fair
events.description: Local crafters showcase handmade goods. Student organizations will also have booths.
events.imageSource: Spratt, Annie. “person doing handcrafts.” Unsplash, 30 Sept. 2017, unsplash.com/photos/person-doing-handcrafts-TywjkDHf0Ps.
events.fullDescription: Over 50 vendors featuring handmade crafts and various decorations. Student clubs will sell baked goods and crafts.
events.foodAndBeverage: Bake sale and coffee station available

events.title: Winter Concert
events.description: Annual winter performance featuring the school band, orchestra, and choir presenting various musical pieces.
events.imageSource: Monteiro, Anita. “a group of people sitting next to each other in front of a band.” Unsplash, 15 Dec. 2022, unsplash.com/photos/a-group-of-people-sitting-next-to-each-other-in-front-of-a-band-pseEmMT-kyo.
events.fullDescription: Join us for an evening of music as our music department presents their winter song collection.

events.title: Wrestling Tournament
events.description: Regional wrestling tournament featuring top athletes from 15 schools across all weight classes.
events.imageSource: Chow, Chris. “man lying on ground over man wearing green jersey shirt.” Unsplash, 17 Nov. 2018, unsplash.com/photos/man-lying-on-ground-over-man-wearing-green-jersey-shirt-1pUWPMFo6VE.
events.fullDescription: Full-day wrestling tournament with preliminary rounds, semifinals, and championships. Awards ceremony after final matches.

events.title: Career and Technical Education Showcase
events.description: Exhibit of student projects from our CTE programs, including robotics, information technology, etc.
events.imageSource: Vanooteghem, Jelleke. “two white and black electronic device with wheels.” Unsplash, 11 Feb. 2018, unsplash.com/photos/two-white-and-black-electronic-device-with-wheels-6NUlOHM40w8.
events.fullDescription: Explore the achievements of our Career and Technical Education students. Live demonstrations, exhibits, and information about CTE careers.
events.foodAndBeverage: Water fountains available, no food service
